English Language Learners Definition of fruit
: a usually sweet food (such as a blueberry, orange, or apple) that grows
technical : the part of a plant that has the seeds in it (such as the pod
of a pea, a nut, a grain, or a berry)
: a result or reward that comes from some action or activity
